about_the_game:
Get ready for the new season with the Shades of Red Season Pass Bundle!

Take advantage of this limited-time offer to get your hands on:

- One (1) Premium Season Pass for Year 6 Season 2: Access 100 tiers of in-game rewards.
- Twenty (20) Tier Skips: Instantly progress through multiple tiers in the premium season pass, granting you immediate access to their rewards.
- One (1) Western Rowan Outfit: A western Rowan-inspired outfit comprising two (2) pieces.
- One (1) Western Rowan Weapon skin: A matching weapon skin to the Rowan Outfit.
- 500 Premium Credits: For use in the in-game store.

Please check the in-game Special Deliveries inventory tab for your items if you do not receive a notification.

The premium season pass entitlement does not grant an additional pass or stack if you have already purchased it. This bundle will only be available for a limited time and the offer will not be repeated.

Take advantage of this limited-time offer to get your hands on:

- One (1) Western Rowan Outfit: A western Rowan-inspired outfit comprising two (2) pieces.
- One (1) Western Rowan Weapon skin: A matching weapon skin to the Rowan Outfit.
- 500 Premium Credits: For use in the in-game store.

Please check the in-game Special Deliveries inventory tab for your items if you do not receive a notification.

The premium season pass entitlement does not grant an additional pass or stack if you have already purchased it. This bundle will only be available for a limited time and the offer will not be repeated.
